hackathon-eligibility: Teams must consist of 4 or fewer members. Only teams that were admitted to BoilerMake and are physically present at the event will be judged.
hackathon-requirements: Submit a description of your hack along with screenshots or pictures. Also include a link to the project, if applicable.
hackathon-rules:
- All hacks must be submitted to ChallengePost by 11:00am on Sunday, October 19.
- You may not build off of exisiting projects or write project specific code prior to the event. Use of 3rd party APIs and libraries is allowed.
- The decision of judges is final for determining prizes and awards.
- Please comply with all instructions from BoilerMake organizers.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each team member chooses one: Apple Watch, Oculus Rift, Xbox One, Playstation 4, 4k Monitor, DJI or Parrot Drone, iPad, Moto 360

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Interactive Intelligence - Best Use of Interactive API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: iPad Mini for each team member (4)

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Paypal - Best use of Paypal, Venmo, or Braintree

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Qualcomm DragonBoard for each team member
Pebble watches for each team member
MongoDB Swag + Amazon Gift Card for each team member
Choice of Beats headphones or mechanical keyboards (1 per hacker)
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Bloomberg - Most innovative use of Bloomberg API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $100 gift card for each team member
$100 gift card for each team member

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Twilio - best use of Twilio API
